concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Release notes for the 1.0 version of the Go SDK.

concept.title: Version 1.0.0-beta [0.9.0] (7 July 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 1.0.0-beta is the beta pending our 1.0.0 GA release of the Go SDK.

concept.title: Version 0.3.0 (16 June 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 0.3.0 continues the progression towards a 1.0.0 GA release of our Go SDK.

ul.li: Added support for performing bulk operations.
Added support for GeoSpatial view queries.
Added additional user-oriented error handling functionality.
Added further options to GetReplica method.
Added support for specifying various internal timeouts.

concept.title: Version 0.2.0 (9 March 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 0.2.0 continues the progression towards a 1.0.0 GA release of our Go SDK

ul.li: Added support for performing management operations.
Significant refactoring of the code-base to enhance performance and testability.

concept.title: Version 0.1.0 (25 February 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 0.1.0 was the first official release of our Go SDK.
